pageContext.claim: “'Barack Obama talked a lot about hope, but Donald Trump delivered the American Dream. All the economic indicators, what’s happening overseas, Donald Trump has proven to be far more successful than Barack Obama. President Trump is delivering the American Dream.' Jason Chaffetz”
pageContext.analysis: Trump tweeted this comment by a former Republican lawmaker, but it ignores the fact that Trump inherited a growing economy from Obama, with most of the indicators continuing on the same path.
